actions.name: Armor Tail

cost.trigger: The user, or an allied creature within 8m of you, is targeted by a [Priority X] Action.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user, or an allied creature within 8m of you, is targeted by a [Priority X] Action.
Effect: The triggering [Priority X] action in Range fails to hit the user or an ally. Actions failing to hit do not activate on-miss effects.

system.description:
Trigger: The user, or an allied creature within 8m of you, is targeted by a [Priority X] Action.
Effect: The triggering [Priority X] action in Range fails to hit the user or an ally. Actions failing to hit do not activate on-miss effects.
